subMembers.name: BaseGaugeAnimation
subMembers.description: Specifies animation properties.

subMembers.name: duration
subMembers.description: Determines how long animation runs.

subMembers.name: easing
subMembers.description: Specifies the animation easing mode.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not animation is enabled.

subMembers.name: BaseGaugeLoadingIndicator
subMembers.description: Configures the loading indicator.

subMembers.name: BaseGaugeRangeContainer
subMembers.description: Specifies properties of the gauge's range container.

subMembers.name: backgroundColor
subMembers.description: Specifies a range container's background color.

subMembers.name: offset
subMembers.description: Specifies the offset of the range container from an invisible scale line in pixels.

subMembers.name: palette
subMembers.description: Specifies the palette to be used for colorizing ranges in the range container.

subMembers.name: paletteExtensionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies what to do with colors in the [palette] when their number is less than the number of ranges in the range container.

subMembers.name: BaseGaugeScale
subMembers.description: Specifies properties of the gauge's scale.

subMembers.name: allowDecimals
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to allow decimal values on the scale. When **false**, the scale contains integer values only.

subMembers.name: customMinorTicks
subMembers.description: Specifies an array of custom minor ticks.

subMembers.name: customTicks
subMembers.description: Specifies an array of custom major ticks.

subMembers.name: endValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the end value for the scale of the gauge.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Specifies common properties for scale labels.

subMembers.name: minorTickInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies an interval between minor ticks.

subMembers.name: scaleDivisionFactor
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum distance between two neighboring [major ticks] in pixels.

subMembers.name: startValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the start value for the scale of the gauge.

subMembers.name: tickInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies an interval between major ticks.

subMembers.name: BaseGaugeScaleLabel
subMembers.description: Specifies common properties for scale labels.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed in scale labels.

subMembers.name: format
subMembers.description: Formats a value before it is displayed in a scale label. Accepts only numeric formats.

subMembers.name: overlappingBehavior
subMembers.description: Decides how to arrange scale labels when there is not enough space to keep all of them.

subMembers.name: useRangeColors
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not scale labels should be colored similarly to their corresponding ranges in the [range container].

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not scale labels are visible on the gauge.

subMembers.name: BaseGaugeTooltip
subMembers.description: Configures tooltips.

subMembers.name: contentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for a tooltip.

subMembers.name: customizeTooltip
subMembers.description: Allows you to change the appearance of specified tooltips.

subMembers.name: interactive
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->
